content.rendered:
Directed by Otsuichi. Yûzô Satô

Written by Otsuichi. Hirotaka Adachi

Cast .Sumi Jo. Lena Park. Mamamoo. Rain. Jung Ji-hoon. AKMU. You Hee-yeol. Yim Jae-beom

Production Studio 5. Bakken Record. Tatsunoko Production.

Certificate 13+

Official site Official Netflix

Season 1

Total Episodes 8
